an4.59:1.1: “Bhojanam, bhikkhave, dadamano dayako patiggahakanam cattari thanani deti.
an4.59:1.3: Ayum deti, vannam deti, sukham deti, balam deti.
an4.59:1.4: Ayum kho pana datva ayussa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.59:1.5: Vannam datva … sukham datva … balam datva balassa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.59:1.6: Bhojanam, bhikkhave, dadamano dayako patiggahakanam imani cattari thanani detiti.
